CatDescriptText: The plaque is inscribed "The Homewood-Bruston Community Improvement Association, Inc., presents the second annual Citizens Award to Mrs. Ora E. Sims for meritorious services rendered the association and the community over a period of 9 years in furthering and encouraging betterment thru the growth of block clubs. Awarded October 10, 1965, Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania" and the certificate reads "The Homewood-Brushton Improvement Association, Incorporated hereby presents it's second annual block club of the year award to the 900-1000 blocks of Blackadore Street, Mrs. Mary Campbell, President..."
TitMainTitle: Ora E. Sims holding plaque, and another woman, possibly Mary Campbell, holding certificate from Homewood Brushton Community Improvement Association, standing on either side of man behind banquet table, in interior with tinsel garland decoration
